content.title: FutureSkills Prime Incentive Program
content.department: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
content.details: The scheme 'FutureSkills Prime Incentive Program' is being administered by the MeitY (Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology) to promote a novel skilling ecosystem in the country. The program incentivizes the cost of eligible courses, providing authentic and accredited certifications that are acceptable in the industry. FutureSkills Prime has introduced a first-of-its-kind incentive program for digital upskilling, allowing learners to upskill in 10 of the most in-demand technologies and earn incentives up to ₹ 14,500. The program covers Foundation, Bridge, and Deep Skilling courses across technologies, including AI, IoT, Big Data Analytics, Cloud Computing, Cybersecurity, etc.
benefits: Incentives up to ₹14,500 for eligible courses
50% reimbursement of course fees for Deep Skilling courses
Assessment reimbursement of ₹600 for successful certifications
eligibility: Applicant must be a citizen of India
Open to all Indian citizens regardless of age, educational qualification, or income level
Incentive can be availed for all courses offered on the FutureSkills Prime platform, except for free courses
Incentive can be availed only once for each course
documents_required: Bank Account Statement Showing the Account Number and IFSC Code

faqs.question: Can a learner apply for incentives before completing the course?
faqs.answer: No, the incentives are provided after successful course completion and certification.

faqs.question: Is there a limit to the number of courses one can enroll in simultaneously?
faqs.answer: There's no specified limit on the number of courses one can enroll in.

faqs.question: How is the incentive amount disbursed to learners?
faqs.answer: The incentive will be credited to the applicant's bank account within 30 days of submitting the application.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to participate in this program?
faqs.answer: The program is open to all Indian citizens, with no restrictions based on age, educational qualifications, or income levels.
